ColorCraze

Welcome to Color Craze! An addictive, fast-paced colour picker game

This game is built using Bootstrap and jQuery. This game is about picking the right color of the word given to proceed. The time given for the game is about 30 seconds. Pick the correct "color" of the word to get the highest score!

  • Stack used: Bootstrap, jQuery

  • Website

Shopee Product & Design Challenge 2021

Participated in Shopee Product & Design Challenge 2021

Designed and built a prototype for a feature which allows both vouchers and cashbacks to be automatically applied and differentiated too

  • Software used: Figma

  • Prototype
  • Pitch Deck

Fitmeets

Welcome to FitMeets! A sleek and easy meetup platform for sporty people by FitMeets

Imagine you are the sporty type and needs people to accompany you. And you need a really sleek platform to do that.

FitMeets is the platform that can be used to organise meetups for sports. You can create events and join them at ease!

  • Stack used: Bootstrap, jQuery, React, Ruby on Rails (RoR)

  • Website
